borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div><span style="font-size: 11pt;">The proposed first floor rear extension by reason of its excessive scale produces a bulky and&nbsp;discordant feature within the wider street scene.&nbsp; This is</span>&nbsp;considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area, notably given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</div><div>-&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;Policies SP 2, DMD 1, DMD 4 and DMD 6 of the Draft Local Plan&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">(Regulation 19 Consultation&nbsp;Version, October 2020);</span></div><div>- Policies CP2 and CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</div>

<div>The proposed first floor rear extension by reason of it excessive scale and siting results in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of outlook and daylight to neighbouring occupiers, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</div><div>-&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;Policies DMD 1, and DMD 6 of the Draft Local Plan&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">(Regulation 19 Consultation&nbsp;Version, October 2020);</span><br></div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</div>
description: Construction of a first floor rear extension
